    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ApiError
    Data Transfer Object for error responses.
    Application
    Main application class for the Library Management System.
    Book
    Represents a book in the library system.
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler for the Library Management System.
    ItemNotAvailableException
    Exception thrown when a requested item is not available for checkout.
    ItemNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested item is not found in the system.
    Journal
    Represents a journal in the library system.
    LibraryItem
    Abstract base class representing a library item.
    LibraryItemRepository
    Repository class for managing LibraryItem entities.
    Loan
    Represents a loan transaction in the library system.
    LoanController
    REST controller for managing loan operations in the Library Management System.
    LoanItem
    Represents an individual item within a loan.
    LoanItemRepository
    Repository class for managing LoanItem entities.
    LoanItemResponse
    Data Transfer Object for loan item responses.
    LoanNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested loan is not found in the system.
    LoanRepository
    Repository class for managing Loan entities.
    LoanRequest
    Data Transfer Object for loan creation requests.
    LoanResponse
    Data Transfer Object for detailed loan responses.
    LoanService
    Service interface for loan management operations.
    LoanServiceImpl
    Implementation of the LoanService interface.
    LoanStatus
    Represents an individual item within a loan.
    LoanSummaryResponse
    Data Transfer Object for loan summary responses.
    Member
    Represents a library member who can borrow items.
    MemberNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a requested member is not found in the system.
    MemberRepository
    Repository class for managing Member entities.
    OpenApiConfig
    Configuration class for OpenAPI/Swagger documentation.
